header.title: Software Engineer & Designer
header.description: Iâ€™m a Full-Stack Developer passionate about building well-structured software and delivering dynamic digital experiences. With a solid foundation in Software Engineering, I specialize in React for frontend development and relational databases using Python with Flask for backend. Complemented by a rich background in Design and Illustration, I'm able to contribute both technical and creative skills, taking products from concept to execution with a unified vision.
header.prompt: Want to learn more? Use the links below.

description.main: Events platform where yarn crafters and fiber businesses can create and promote events to build community and foster creativity.
description.backend: RESTful API with Python and Flask.

responsibilities: Customizes and maintains Shopify theme to enhance user experience and improve site navigation.
Makes recommendations on which features to implement to enhance usability for shop managers.
Founded and grew a successful retail and wholesale business designing tools and novelties for fiber artists and other crafters.
Manages all aspects of the business including design, production, logistics, and e-commerce.
Manages social media campaigns, growing the brand's following to over 20K with continued engagement.
Developed print & digital designs for various government organizations and high-profile institutions.
Clients include The Brookings Institution of Executive Education, The National Park Service, The Office of Compliance, and The Federal Trade Commission.
Deliverables include branding packages, annual reports, internal template decks, websites, and both print and web advertising campaigns.

education.details: Full-stack engineering bootcamp focusing on JavaScript, React, SQL, Python, and Flask with emphasis on relational databases.
Graduated with a top portfolio score specializing in 3D concepts and visual storytelling.
